p: S. Enteritidis 232 was found to be the least sensitive isolate to C. zeylanicum and S. aromaticum alone or in combination; S. Enteritidis 233 was found to be poorly sensitive to C. zeylanicum and S. aromaticum, but showed a large inhibition zone (15.0 mm) when tested with the mixture. The strains 234 and 236 appeared to be the most sensitive to these EOs.
